summary:
Before the dawn of man or beast, immortals waged war against each other. The Epirus Bow, a weapon of immense power, weapon of the Gods, were lost on Skyrim during the war. 
Find the Epirus bow to either use it or to destroy it. Learn the true power of the Gods.
-Watch the video-

descriptionHtml:
-Watch the new video - Version 1.1-
[img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg716/scaled.php?server=716&filename=newprojectlogo6.jpg&res=landing[/img]





[img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg72/scaled.php?server=72&filename=newprojectlogo6videos3.jpg&res=landing[/img]



[size=4][color=turquoise]GAMESPOT - TOP 5 MODS OF THE WEEK[/color][/size]
[youtube]uf7WO37mq7o[/youtube]


[size=4][color=turquoise]VERSION 1.1 VIDEO[/color][/size]
[youtube]x339DimPc8Y[/youtube]




[size=4][color=turquoise]MOD FEATURES AND OLDER VIDEOS[/size][/color]
[youtube]iaZmByLDA7I[/youtube] [youtube]p0OLKB5WeCs[/youtube]
[youtube]4kue4B3Xx5k[/youtube] [youtube]SrasXaxxh94[/youtube]




[img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg62/scaled.php?server=62&filename=newprojectlogo6descript.jpg&res=landing[/img]
[b][color=turquoise]Before the dawn of man or beast, immortals waged war against each other. The Epirus Bow, a weapon of immense power, weapon of the Gods, were lost on Skyrim during the war. Find the Epirus bow to either use it or to destroy it. Learn the true power of the Gods.

This mod brings player the Epirus bow. Player can disenchant the bow and learn it\'s effects. After disenchanting the weapon, the player can enchant any weapon(Swords, maces, axes and bows) with the Power Of The Gods enchantment. 

This mod combined with my other mod Master The Time And Space brings you the feeling that you are one of the Gods.[/color][/b] 





[size=4][color=grey]EFFECTS OF THE ENCHANTMENT[/color][/size]
[b][color=turquoise]- Drains some of the target\'s magicka. 
- Sends the enemy flying with cool visual effects
- Creates a staggering effect near the player.
- Cool sound effect, when you hit the target.[/color][/b]



[size=4][color=grey]LOCATION[/color][/size]
[b][color=turquoise]Bow is located near Falkreath. Picture will show the exact location of the bow.[/color][/b]





[size=4][color=grey]PROBLEMS FINDING THE BOW[/color][/size]
[b][color=turquoise]-Make sure that the mod is installed correctly.
-Make sure that the mod is marked to load in the game.

-Type help epirus in console.[/color][/b]
-Type coc epirusbowlocation in console. It will take you close to the bow.

*There is currently no image for the bow in items menu*



[color=red]Remember to endorse, if you like the mod[/color]




[size=4][color=turquoise]-UPDATE AND RELEASE NOTES-[/color][/size]


[color=red]-Version 1.0-[/color]

[color=grey]-First release.[/color]


[color=red]-Version 1.1-[/color]

[color=grey]-Glowing Epirus Arrows.
-Auto equip and unequip epirus arrows.
-Minor stat changes to the bow.[/color]


[color=turquoise][size=2]Created By WarriorKeKe[/color][/size]

[color=red][size=3]If you want to know what I\'m currently working with, check my blog. Resource for the latest info of my mods, future plans, new mods and much more.[/color][/size]

[url=http://warriorkeke.blogspot.com]WarriorKeKe\'s Blog[/url]


[b][color=turquoise]-OTHER MODS-[/color][/b]

Spell Force Ice 
Spell Lumen

Spell Death Awaits
Spell Summon Ancient Greybeard Phantom
Spell Mass Force
Spell Force Bash[/color]
